title.narrative: Pacific Island Country Governments have strengthened institutional frameworks for equitable & sustainable water, sanitation and hygiene services, particularly in target countries.

description.narrative: FUNICEF Pacific continued to provide PICTs with support to strengthen institutional frameworks for equitable and sustainable WASH services. Highlights include identifying an innovative financing mechanism in Kiribati and introducing centralized WASH SDG monitoring databases in Fiji and Vanuatu. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
